explanation: The stage direction describes a visual scene with a narrative quality, indicating the arrival of a character (the genie Beninguet) and the details of this appearance (a luminous chariot decorated with jewels). It reads more like a description or narration rather than just an action or entrance.
stgdir: En même temps, on voit descendre des nues un char lumineux sous lequel paraît le génie Beninguet, tout brillant de pierreries.
